current_diet_plan.summary: This is a mock 7-day diet plan. Replace with actual Gemini output.

monday.lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas and vegetables
monday.dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and broccoli

tuesday.breakfast: Greek yogurt with fruit and honey
tuesday.dinner: Salmon fillet with asparagus and brown rice

wednesday.breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole-wheat toast
wednesday.dinner: Turkey meatballs with zucchini noodles and marinara sauce

thursday.breakfast: Smoothie with protein powder, banana, and spinach
thursday.lunch: Tuna salad sandwich on whole-grain bread
thursday.dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with tofu and brown rice

friday.dinner: Lean steak with a side salad

saturday.breakfast: Avocado toast with a poached egg
saturday.lunch: Mediterranean platter (hummus, pita, olives, feta, cucumber)
saturday.dinner: Homemade pizza on whole-wheat crust with lots of veggies

sunday.lunch: Large green salad with grilled chicken
